songs.title: Best Friend
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I've waited
I've waited (waited)
Time went by (by)
But all I could do is cry (cry)
Silly, silly

[Hook]
Yeah, Can I be your best friend?
And your girl and ma brother are her best man
Ride around the city, in a brand new Benz
I know you don't like getting new friends

[Verse 1]
So it's just me and you
And you be looking cool
Heard you wanna [?] fill the pint with something cool
Whatchu wanna do girl, whatchu wanna do?
We can slide in the coupe, we can slide in the coupe
But you sayin he just a friend, I want you
Tryna say all I do is random, I found you
Lyin in the foreign, yeah I gotchu
3 AM in my crib, yeah I'm on you
Got a hundred bad bitches, only want you
Only wanna be your best friend man I worry all about you
Spend some money on some jewels with some [?]
See you last night, I'm still on you

[Hook]
Can I be your best friend?
Yeah, can I be your best friend?
Can I be your best friend?
Yeah, can I be your best friend?

[Bridge]
Best friend
Can I be your best friend?
Yeah, can I be your best friend?
Your Best friend (Oh)
